parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this business glossary term is created.

parameters.name: glossaryIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the business glossary in which this term is created.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of this business glossary term.

parameters.name: termRelations
parameters.description: The term relations of this business glossary term. classifies (list) --- The classifies of the term relations. (string) --- isA (list) --- The isA property of the term relations. (string) ---

nested_params.name: classifies
nested_params.description: The classifies of the term relations.

nested_params.name: isA
nested_params.description: The isA property of the term relations.
